about.title: About us
about.subtitle: We are an IT consultancy company specialized in Business Analysis and System Development.
about.what_we_do_title: What we DoWe analyze the organization and objectives of our customers, and develop IT systems according its operational needs.
about.our_mission_title: Our MissionTo bring value to our customers by introducing innovative and efficient processes in its operations.
about.why_choose_title: Why choose UsBecause we are experienced and reliable, commited with quality, and always place the customer first.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle:
We offer consultancy services in
Business Intelligence and System Development
services.business_analysis_short_description:
Are you tired of trying to fit your organization into your IT system? Do you need to implement new processes in your company, increase the efficiency of operations, connect to new partners and obtain more value from your information in real time?
We can help you.
services.system_development_short_description:
Would you like to automate your data collection and data analysis processes?
Does your IT infrastructure needs an update or do you want to migrate it into the cloud?
We design and develop customized IT solutions according the needs and requirements of your organization.

team.title: Meet our Team
team.content_1:
Paulo is a former Portuguese Army Signals Officer, with a Degree in Electrical and Electronic Engineering.
Through the course of his career, and after working in several international projects, Paulo has gained valuable experience in systems engineering, business analysis, scientific research, project management, team-leadership and, lately, entrepreneurship.
He is the CEO and founder of Videritis.
